thing-type.label: A8-9 Multi-purpose sensor
thing-type.description: Multi-purpose sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtMCOHome A8-9 is a Z-Wave enabled multiple environmental monitoring sensors, with 3.5 inch TFT<br /&gtclear display and compliant to Z-Wave Plus standard. It is built in with <strong&gtTemperature, Humidity,</strong&gt<br /&gt<strong&gtPM2.5, CO2, VOC, PIR, illumination, Noise, Smoke</strong&gt sensors. Device can be added into any Z-Wave<br /&gtnetwork, and is compatible with any other Z-Wave certified devices.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtTemperature: 0 °C ~ 50 °C</li&gt <li&gtHumidity: 0% RH ~ 99% RH</li&gt <li&gtPM2.5: 0 µg / m<sup&gt3 </sup&gt~ 500 µg / m<sup&gt3</sup&gt</li&gt <li&gtCO<sub&gt2</sub&gt: 0 ppm ~ 5000 ppm</li&gt <li&gtVOC: 0 ppb - 64000 ppb</li&gt <li&gtIllumination: 0 Lux ~ 40000 Lux</li&gt <li&gtNoise: 30 dB ~ 100 dB</li&gt <li&gtPIR: 0 or 1 detection angle up to 120°</li&gt <li&gtSmoke: 0 or 1</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtSpecification</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtDimension: 110 * 110 * 32 mm</li&gt <li&gtSelf-dissipation: < 3 Watt</li&gt <li&gtHole Pitch: 60 mm or 82 mm</li&gt <li&gtWork environment: -20 °C ~ + 60 °C < 99% RH (non-condensation)</li&gt <li&gtHousing: Tempered glass + PC Alloy</li&gt <li&gtInstallation: Wall-mounted (vertical)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtCommand Class supported by the device: (Supports S2 unauthenticated level)</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_VERSION</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_MANUFACTURER_SPECIFIC</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_POWERLEVEL</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_ASSOCIATION</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_ASSOCIATION_GRP_INFO</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_CONFIGURATION</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_MULTILEVEL</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_MD</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtCommand Class supported by the device: (Not supporting S2)</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_ZWAVEPLUS_INFO</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_TRANSPORT_SERVICE_V2</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_SECURITY_2</li&gt <li&gtCOMMAND_CLASS_SUPERVISION</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtNote: A Security Enabled Z-Wave Controller must be used in order to fully utilise the product</strong&gt</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt<strong&gtAdd to Z-Wave network</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtActivate inclusion mode in the gateway. When device is powered on, hold F1 to select the interface for Z-Wave network inclusion.</li&gt <li&gtClick F2 five times until <em&gt<refresh icon></em&gt turns blue.</li&gt <li&gtHold F2 and the device enters into learning mode, then <em&gt<network icon></em&gt turns blue and the device is added into Z-Wave network.</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt<strong&gtRemove from Z-Wave network</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtActivate exclusion mode in the gateway. When device is powered on, hold F1 to select the interface for Z-Wave network exclusion.</li&gt <li&gtClick F2 five times until <em&gt<refresh icon></em&gt turns blue.</li&gt <li&gtHold F2 and the device enters into learning mode, then <em&gt<network icon></em&gt turns blue and the device is added into Z-Wave network.</li&gt </ul&gt
